data: Respondents were asked if they had difficulty seeing (even when wearing glasses or contact lenses, for those who use them). Respondents who reported "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or who could not hear at all were classified as having vision difficulty.

Respondents were asked if they had difficulty seeing (even when wearing glasses or contact lenses, for those who use them). Respondents who reported "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or who could not hear at all were classified as having vision difficulty.

caption: Percentage of difficulty seeing for adults aged 18 and over (95% confidence intervals), United States
caption3: Respondents were asked if they had difficulty seeing (even when wearing glasses or contact lenses, for those who use them). Respondents who reported "some" or "a lot" of difficulty or who could not hear at all were classified as having vision difficulty.
